data.actual_result: The message is deleted and you "jump back to present"
data.expected_result: The message should be deleted and you should still be where you were before
data.short_description: Channel jumps to the latest message when the last message is deleted
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message (happens also if you aren't the author) - Scroll up (it happens UNLESS  the option "JUMP TO PRESENT" is visible, so if you have it, scroll down a bit until you don't see it anymore) - Ask someone or a bot to delete the latest message
